messages.title: Apprenticeships offer real choice
messages.content: Apprenticeships give young people particularly those who are not academic the chance of a real career and a choice for everyone about how to develop their skills.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vikki has been fighting to support local traders and keep the high street vibrant.
Vikki wants schools to work for everyone, an education policy that helps every child play to their strengths and an end to the culture of endless high-stakes testing.
Fighting for the bus routes that are so vital to Dorset's urban and rural communities.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race and Vikki Slade is the only person who can beat the Conservatives here.

issues.education: Your local schools have had their budgets cut year on year with growing numbers of students and less money to spend.

leaflet.personalStatement: A true local champion fighting for a Stronger Economy and a Fairer Society in Dorset and Poole.

endorsements.endorsement: If Vikki is half as brilliant and driven as a candidate as I have known her to be for a good little time now then she is the best person to succeed in representing Broadstone.
Vikki is extremely approachable and understands the needs of young people in Dorset and Poole.
I have been so impressed with Vikki's energy and passion for our area. She is extremely likeable and has my vote.

images.caption: Vikki Slade with residents and community members.
